metadata.scenario: Customer support interaction about a billing issue

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm having a billing issue. My recent bill seems much higher than usual. I've checked my usage, and it doesn't seem to match the charges.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the billing issue. I can certainly look into that for you. Could you please provide your account number so I can access your billing information?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, it's 1234567890. I'm really frustrated because I've been a customer for years and have never had this problem. And frankly, the bill is more than double what I usually pay!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. I've pulled up your account. It appears there's a charge for premium streaming services. Can you confirm whether you authorized the purchase? And, if so, why wasn't I notified earlier?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yes, I did sign up for that, but I was told it was a free trial! Why wasn't I notified when the trial ended and the billing started? And, can I have that charge removed? I wasn't aware it would start billing me.
